mapper.insert: insert into tbl_customer ( id, owner, name, website, phone, createBy, createTime, contactSummary, nextContactTime, description, address )values ( #{id}, #{owner}, #{name}, #{website}, #{phone}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{contactSummary}, #{nextContactTime}, #{description}, #{address} )
mapper.select: select * from tbl_customer where name like '%' #{name} '%'
